data.text: @BickieVee @AJ_amyjoydonut Yournewswire is notorious as a source of clickbait #FakeNews . Even David Icke has called them out.

@BickieVee @AJ_amyjoydonut There is no evidence that he said any of them, and it runs counter to the “Bieber is a shape changing reptilian” story by the same author. At least one of these must be wrong. I’d put good money on both being #FakeNews .

@4tis @AJ_amyjoydonut R U paid to derail and redirect?
There are kernels of truth in every story. Provide proof that Bieber didn't say any of these things, other than your personal say-so and your bias against the author of the article, and you'll have my respect. Until then, thanks for playing.
@BickieVee @AJ_amyjoydonut It’s not shutting down the dialogue. How can both stories, by the same author, within the same year, be simultaneously true?
@4tis @AJ_amyjoydonut Eh, maybe only about as much as you believe derailing works on everyone to shut down the dialog. Enjoy your life.
@BickieVee @AJ_amyjoydonut So you also believe that Biedermeier is a shapeshifting reptilian? This is also from yournewswire by the same “journalist”. https://t.co/vC6jMAx2Dz

@4tis @AJ_amyjoydonut @4tis, you know him personally and have his approval to speak on his behalf? Let's wait to see what Mr. Bieber has to say about this article, shall we? And not through another tabloid, either.
@AJ_amyjoydonut He didn’t say that did he. It’s just more clickbait.
